title: John Vervaeke, Jordan Peterson and Hubert Dreyfus, the Frame Problem and God
description:
In my recent conversation with John Vervaeke I connected the Frame Problem with the question of God. I bring in some video from Jordan Peterson and Hubert Dreyfus to explain the frame problem a bit deeper and its consequences and I add some additional commentary. 

My conversation with John Vervaeke https://youtu.be/BqinRbjqy2c
Vervaeke Meaning Crisis #28 https://youtu.be/Yp6F80Nx0lc
Hubert Dreyfus on the Frame Problem https://youtu.be/SUZUbYCBtGI
Hubert Dreyfus on Socrates https://youtu.be/LG5nCkcZm-g
The Metaphysical Club https://amzn.to/32TYKmS
CS Lewis Miracles https://amzn.to/32YZ43J
CS Lewis the Problem of Pain https://amzn.to/2pI6WZd
Alvin Plantinga God Freedom and Evil https://amzn.to/2oQlJAs
Bret Weinstein Unbelievable https://youtu.be/kRx2uNMJFnU
Jordan Peterson Personality Class 2015 Carl Jung https://youtu.be/DC0faZiBcG0
